aboutDescription: Can't find anything suitable for yourself? We helped!
aboutClothes: The best clothes from the best materials. True style never goes out of style
aboutJewerly: Stunning handmade jewelry for you. Bring sparkle to your everyday life

aboutFormDesc: All products presented on the website comply with international quality standards
name: Name
sliderBeauty: Discover the world of true beauty with our award-winning products! Do you dream of glowing skin, luxurious hair and perfect makeup? We select only the best products with natural ingredients and effective formulas. We are chosen for quality.
sliderFragrances: Discover the world of sophisticated aromas with our exclusive perfumes! Whether it's delicate floral notes, sensual oriental scents or fresh citrus accords - we have a perfume for every occasion and mood. Choose from a collection created by the world's best perfumers and enjoy the long lasting sound of each scent.
sliderFurniture: Transform your home with our stylish and high-quality furniture! Our products combine modern design, convenience and convenience, creating the ideal atmosphere of coziness and comfort. Order now and enjoy a stylish environment every day!
sliderGroceries: We offer only the best: from proven vegetables and fruits to fresh meat and dairy products that give your dishes a unique taste and benefits. Our products undergo strict quality control, providing you and your loved ones with healthy and tasty nutrition.
sliderHomeDecoration: Each element is created to give your interior a unique charm and comfort. Our decorations help create an atmosphere in which you will be pleased to be every day. Order now and turn your home into a place where beauty meets comfort!
sliderKitchenAccessories: Update your kitchen with our stylish and functional accessories! We offer a wide range of high-quality products that will make your cooking experience a pleasure. Make every moment in the kitchen special by focusing on design and practicality.
sliderLaptops: Open up a world of limitless possibilities with our state-of-the-art laptops! We offer the best models that combine power, style and innovation. Our laptops are ideal for work, study and play, delivering amazing performance and reliability.
sliderMensShirts: Replenish your wardrobe with stylish and elegant men's shirts that will highlight your individuality and impeccable taste. Our shirts are made from high quality fabrics for comfort and durability.
sliderMensShoes: Each pair of shoes is crafted with attention to detail to provide you with impeccable style and comfort in any situation. High quality materials, elegant designs and premium finishes make our shoes ideal for the office, business meetings and special events.
sliderMensWatches: Add a touch of elegance and status to your look with our men's watches! Choose a men's watch that will become not just an accessory, but a reflection of your status and style.
sliderMobileAccessories: Choose from a wide range of colors and designs to highlight your personality and make using your phone even more comfortable and enjoyable. Discover new possibilities with accessories that complement and enhance your mobile experience.
sliderMotorcycle: Feel the power and dynamics on the road, enjoy excellent control and safety. Choose a motorcycle that will become your faithful companion in conquering new horizons and will give every day a unique drive.
sliderSkinCare: Discover the secret to glowing, healthy skin with our premium skin care products! Our products are formulated using the latest technology and natural ingredients to give your skin impeccable hydration, nutrition and protection.
sliderSmartphones: We offer a wide range of models to suit your every need - from flagship devices with powerful processors and incredible cameras to affordable smartphones with great functionality and reliability.
sliderSportsAccessories: Improve your workout performance, track your progress, and enjoy every moment of your activity with products that combine style and function. With our sports accessories you will always be one step ahead!
sliderSunglasses: Our glasses are not just an accessory, but an investment in your vision and style. With high quality UV protected lenses and fashionable frames, they are suitable for both work and play. They highlight your individuality and ensure comfortable vision in any conditions.
sliderTablets: Choose the best tablet option for yourself - a 3-month warranty, AMOLED and RETINA displays, premium segment.
sliderTops: Our tops flatter your figure while remaining lightweight and comfortable to wear. Made from high quality materials, our tops are perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions.
sliderVehicle: The spacious interior, thoughtful details and modern multimedia system make every trip a real pleasure. This car is created for those who value style, quality and reliability.
sliderWomensBags: Spacious and functional, our bags allow you to have everything you need at hand, whether for a business meeting or a walk around the city. A variety of models and colors will satisfy the most sophisticated tastes.
sliderWomensDresses: Whether it's a romantic evening or a business meeting, in our range you will find a dress that is perfect for you. High-quality fabrics and impeccable cut will ensure comfort and confidence in every movement.
sliderWomensJewellery: With our jewelry you will always be the center of attention, feeling confident and attractive. Choose what will highlight your beauty and add charm to every day!
sliderWomensShoes: Each pair is created taking into account the latest fashion trends so that you can feel confident and look perfect in any situation. Our shoes will highlight your individuality and become an indispensable element of your wardrobe.
sliderWomensWatches: Whether it's a classic watch for business meetings or sophisticated models for evening outings, they will highlight your individuality and add zest to any look. By choosing our women's watches, you emphasize your taste and self-confidence.

title: Title
mainLoginText: Log in to your account to make profitable purchases
mainInfoText: All products presented on our website are covered by a warranty of 1 week to 7 years. During the warranty period, in the event of a breakdown or defect, we promptly repair or replace equipment within the framework of the warranty obligations, and also assume the costs of delivery of repaired/replaced/replacement products. Upon receipt of a justified complaint, we accept the defective product in order to conduct a technical examination and make a decision based on the defect in our service center.
mainInfoTextService: Submission of complaints (claims) for products under warranty is carried out within the warranty period, which is indicated in the passport of the finished product. We consider each complaint within 60 hours from the moment of its receipt. The deadline for replacing defective goods is indicated in the response (Conclusion) to the complaint, taking into account its availability in our warehouse or production time.
